Some more code with the py at the start:

import tensorflow as tf

docs.title: With a title
With line numbers
docs.text:
def bubble_sort(items):
    for i in range(len(items)):
        for j in range(len(items) - 1 - i):
            if items[j] > items[j + 1]:
                items[j], items[j + 1] = items[j + 1], items[j]

docs.title: Highlighting lines
docs.text:
def bubble_sort(items):
    for i in range(len(items)):
        for j in range(len(items) - 1 - i):
            if items[j] > items[j + 1]:
                items[j], items[j + 1] = items[j + 1], items[j]

docs.title: Barikoi-Admin is a web-based platform that allows Barikoi Admins to manage other users API keys and monitor their usage. It also provides a manage places data feature that allows admins to add, edit, and delete places data.
The following documents will help you understand the features and functionalities of Barikoi-Admin.
Harmony is a Human Resource Management System (HRMS) that provides a comprehensive solution for managing the full employee lifecycle.

docs.title: Maps Authentication
docs.text: This is private project for Maps Authentication server written in JS with TS and Hono.

docs.title: Authors
docs.text:
• @rilusmahmud

*For any credentials please contat the Author.

docs.title: Tech Stack
docs.text: Server: Node, Hono, JavaScript, TypeScript

docs.title: Get validate
docs.text:
takes the api key and return true or false if validated

  GET /validate
Parameter Type Description api_key string Required. Your API key

docs.text:
This project is used by the following services or companies:

  • Map server for authentication.
